signal_bus_usable_characters.description: Signal and bus names shall only use single-byte alphanumeric characters (a-z, A-Z, 0-9) and single-byte underscore (_). Line breaks, single-byte spaces, double-byte characters, and control characters are prohibited.

signal_bus_no_numbers_at_start.description: Signal and bus names shall not begin with a number.

signal_bus_no_underscore_at_start.description: Signal and bus names shall not begin with an underscore.

signal_bus_no_underscore_at_end.description: Signal and bus names shall not end with an underscore.

signal_bus_no_consecutive_underscores.description: Signal and bus names shall not contain consecutive underscores.

signal_bus_not_reserved_matlab_word.description: Signal and bus names shall not consist solely of a single reserved MATLAB keyword.

signal_bus_max_name_length.description: Signal and bus name length shall be a maximum of 63 characters.
